naslov: Okrug Gornji, velika apartmanska zgrada, bazen, odličan pogled, 688 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Trogir, velika samostojeća apartmanska zgrada bruto površine od 688 kvadrata na 4 etaže. Vrlo atraktivna pozicija, blizu plaže, te s prekrasnim pogledom na more sa svih nadzemnih etaža. Sastoji se od 9 apartmana i vlasničkog stana, odnosno sveukupno 10 stambenih jedinica. U suterenu se nalazi jedan apartman koji sadrži ogromni dnevni boravak, kuhinju i blagovaonicu kao jednu cjelinu, dvije velike spavaće sobe, kupaonicu i WC, strojarnicu te veliku natkrivenu terasu. S vanjske se strane prostire komforni bazen od 31 m2 skupa s uređenim sunčalištem, ljetna kuhinja, zidani roštilj, te vanjski tuš i WC. U prizemlju je smješten vlasnički stan sličnog sadržaja, s time da su tu još i ostava, kotlovnica, praonica, dvije terase, jedna veća nenatkrivena i jedna manja natkrivena, te velika uredska prostorija odnosno recepcija. Prvi i drugi kat čine po četiri apartmana, dva manja se sastoje od jedne spavaće sobe s kuhinjicom i kupaonicom, i dva veća koja sadrže dodatnu blagovaonicu s kuhinjom, odnosno dodatnu kupaonicu. Svaki apartman uključuje i svoj balkon, terasu ili lođu s nenadmašnim pogledom na more. Međukat obuhvaća i jednu ostavu s priborom i dodacima za održavanje apartmana. Cjelokupna zgrada kao i svi apartmani su potpuno opremljeni i namješteni. Postavljeni su brojni klima uređaji, solarni paneli i bojler za toplu vodu, a vlasnički stan u prizemlju ima ugrađeno i centralno grijanje. Postavljena je kvalitetna PVC stolarija s dvoslojnim izo-staklima a djelomično i komarnici. Vlasnički stan ima i rolete na svim prozorima i balkonskim vratima, dok su u apartmanima uvedene nepropusne zavjese. Podne su obloge u sobama laminati a u ostalim prostorijama keramičke pločice. Prošle godine je obnovljena vanjska fasada i ugrađena termo izolacija (stiropor 8cm). Raspoloživa je satelitska televizija, 5G internet (uskoro i optički priključak) s routerima na svakoj etaži, obilje vrtnih garnitura, terasa ispred kuće, osam parkirnih mjesta kao i kanalizacijska mreža. Nekretnina se nalazi u vrlo mirnoj i tihoj sredini, kao stvorenoj za odmor i relaksaciju. Istovremeno svi su dodatni sadržaji u neposrednoj blizini i dostupni pješke, uključujući naravno more i plažu, kao i sam grad Trogir s UNESCO zaštićenom povijesnom jezgrom. Splitski aerodrom je na desetak minuta vožnje. Zgrada se koristila za unosno poslovanje turističkog iznajmljivanja i u cijelosti je koncipirana i pogodna za nastavak iste djelatnosti. --- Trogir, a large detached apartment building with a gross area of ​​688 square meters over 4 floors. Very attractive position, close to the beach, and featuring a beautiful view of the sea from all above-ground floors. It consists of 9 apartments and an owner’s apartment, i.e. a total of 10 residential units. In the partially subterranean floor lies an apartment that contains a huge living room, kitchen and dining room as one unit, two large bedrooms, bathroom and toilet, engine room and a large covered terrace. On the outside, there is a spacious swimming pool of 31 m2 with a well-arranged sundeck, summer kitchen, brick barbecue, and an outdoor shower and toilet. Ground floor comprises the owner’s apartment of similar design, along with a storage room, boiler room, laundry room, two terraces, one larger uncovered and one smaller covered, and a large office room, i.e. reception. The first and second floors consist of four apartments each, the two smaller ones consist of one bedroom with a kitchenette and a bathroom, and the two larger ones containing an additional dining room with a kitchen and one an additional bathroom. Each apartment includes its own balcony, terrace or loggia with an unsurpassed view of the sea. The mezzanine also includes a storage room with accessories for maintaining the apartments. The entire building as well as all apartments are fully equipped and furnished. Numerous air conditioning units, solar panels and a hot water boiler have been installed, and the owner’s apartment on the ground floor has a built-in central heating. High-quality PVC carpentry with double-layer insulating glass and partial mosquito nets were laid down. The owner’s apartment also has shutters on all windows and balcony doors, while the apartments have impermeable curtains. The floor coverings are laminates in bedrooms and ceramic tiles in other rooms. Last year, the external facade was renovated and thermal insulation was installed (styrofoam 8cm). Available is satellite television, 5G internet (soon also optical connection) with routers on each floor, plenty of garden furniture sets, a terrace in front of the house, eight parking spaces and the sewage network. The property is located in a very tranquil and quiet environment, as if created for rest and relaxation. At the same time, all additional facilities are in the immediate vicinity and accessible on foot, including of course the sea and the beach, as well as the city of Trogir itself with its UNESCO-protected historic core. Split airport is a ten-minute drive away. The building was used for the lucrative tourist rental business and is fully designed and suitable for the continuation of the same activity.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
